TopicTitle: KSP is crashing righter after load.

Articles.Content:
Hello all!

My KSP is crashing right after the yellow loading bar at the spinning planets. It is hanging and unresponsive, I have to quit it manually.

RAM usage is at 2.8GB, and I am using full res. It works at half-res, so I'm not sure why it's hanging like that.
At half-rez, loading might be a little harder because its trying to compress something. Also, you didn't give any mods list...do you have any that do anything with textures?

Full-res doesn't work, half res does.

Mods:

KSPI

kethane

KWR

Telemachus

MechJeb

EVE

Astronomer's

Active Texture Management

Dmagic orbital science

Research Them All

Panda Jaegar Laboratories

TAC life support

FatMan Rockets
Hmm.. try load on demand? You should be fine with 4 GB of RAM.

Hmm.. try load on demand? You should be fine with 4 GB of RAM.

Or even better, try 64-bit KSP: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82118-KSP-64bits-on-Windows-(this-time-it-s-not-a-request)
